about_the_game:
Welcome to the Attrax technological institute

Opposites attract, and likes repel. Dive into the mysterious Attrax institute, solving intricate logic puzzles based on the principles of attraction and repulsion, with each puzzle bringing you closer to the origins of the institute. In this captivating single-player experience, enjoy hours of gameplay that will challenge your mind and redefine your understanding of physics and logic.

Attraction and Repulsion

Each puzzle room will test your knowledge of attraction and repulsion. Manipulate charged field generators, charged particles, charged cubes, and other activators in different testing environments in order to solve these puzzles.

The Charge Gun

Take the power of attraction and repulsion into your hands. Use the Charge Gun to directly affect the world around you, flinging objects (yourself included) across rooms to solve intricate puzzles and cross deadly gaps.

Uncover the mysteries of the institute

The institute is much older than it wants you to think, and why is it you can't remember how you came to this place. Keep your eyes and ears open as you progress through the Attrax technological institute, and you just may uncover its deepest and darkest secrets.

Feature List

  • Over 100 puzzles to solve, a true test of your logic and execution
  • Many lore secrets to uncover, for those with sharp eyes and ears
  • A secret ending, for those who can find it
  • Fully re-mappable controls
